description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b60d0","text":"This protocol describes general procedures for culturing HeLa cells, transient transfection, and imaging using an Andor Dragonfly spinning disk confocal system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"ev1to","text":"DMEM Solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kpih","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jebt","text":"      FBS  10%    Penicillin  100 U/ml    Streptomycin  100 mg/ml    L-glutamine  2 mM  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":88}],"data":{}},{"key":"7vea6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["169","170"],"data":[["FBS","10%"],["Penicillin","100 U/ml"],["Streptomycin","100 mg/ml"],["L-glutamine","2 mM"]],"guid":"85D6812FDFC811EB90730A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"20l7q","text":"* (all from Gibco)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["FBS","10%"],["Penicillin","100 U/ml"],["Streptomycin","100 mg/ml"],["L-glutamine","2 mM"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7nkek","text":"Culture the HeLa-M cells at   in 5% CO2 and DMEM containing 10% FBS,   penicillin,   streptomycin, and   L-glutamine (all from Gibco).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d01g5","text":" For general maintenance, when cells reached 80-90% confluency, they were deattached from the dish with Trypsin and diluted 1:20 in a new dish.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eu60c","text":"For live-cell imaging experiments, seed the cells on glass-bottomed dishes (MatTek) at a concentration of 35,000 cells per dish and transfect after   using FuGene HD (Promega) in Opti-MEM (Gibco).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":148,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qub7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"E1887890DFC911EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cah7e","text":"Just before imaging, remove the growth medium and replace with prewarmed live-cell imaging solution (Life Technologies).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cl7sq","text":"For lysotracker experiments, incubate the cells in   LysoTracker Red DND-99 (ThermoFisher) in complete DMEM for  , wash twice with media, then image in live-cell imaging solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5hr4j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"67347110DFCA11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"6FC79230DFCA11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6peir","text":"Perform spinning-disk confocal microscopy using an Andor Dragonfly system equipped with a plan apochromat objective (63×, 1.4 NA, oil) and a Zyla scientific CMOS camera.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5smjp","text":"For any given experiment, use the same exposure time, laser power, and gain for image acquisition to allow for quantitative comparison.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4r11r","text":"Generate the cells stably expressing STING-GFP as described elsewhere.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77mp1","text":"Culture the stable STING-GFP HeLa-M cells at   in 5% CO2 and DMEM containing 10% FBS,   penicillin,   streptomycin, and   Lglutamine (all from Gibco).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":55,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":100,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cqsap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BD25EFE0DFCA11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"0E4B1990DFCB11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1584}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"17C3B8B0DFCB11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"1AC056E0DFCB11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6095o","text":"For experiments using siRNA, transfect 60 pmols of the indicated siRNA using   Lipofectamine RNAiMax (ThermoFisher) in Opti-MEM (Gibco) per dish according to manufacturer protocol. Image the cells   after siRNA transfection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":197,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7u4q8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"816D6F40DFCB11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":259200,"guid":"90FEE0B0DFCB11EBBDB6E9DF8A2022F7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
